page.title: 01EDGEWORTH,TUNLEY,WATERLANE.
page.content: The area is{rural,}chiefly occupying a plateau between the north and south running valleys of the{Holy Brook}and the{River Frome.}The land,about 200 metres high consists of{Cotswold brash.The land cover is mostly grass or crops with some woodland.Minor roads & paths criss cross the area. {Ordnance Survey}references: Sheet 163 Edgeworth 938060 Waterlane 922047 Approx. 8 miles north west Cirencester 8 miles north east Stroud {Parishes :}Edgeworth in own parish Waterlane in Oakridge {District Council:}Edgeworth; Cotswold Waterlane; Stroud {County Council :}Gloucestershire. {Parl.Constituency}for - Edgeworth & Tunley :Cirencester/Tewks. Waterlane :Stroud. {Place of worship :}St.Marys Edgeworth.
